text: [Music]
I did I had no
idea um yeah that's one of the strangest
things uh that's ever happened to me um
you know I often wrote dispatches and
emails and letters uh from different War
zones just because I didn't have time to
write to all my friends individually and
say what it's like and I was getting
tons of emails from people saying you
are you safe are you okay what's going
on in Iraq how bad is it so I would put
together you know a few paragraphs or
maybe a page or two of my Impressions
and email it to them and I think this is
what I did in September 204 except
things were really really bad in Iraq
security was deteriorating um our house
had just been bombed and I had to
evacuate and uh you know people were
getting kidnapped so you know I kind of
told it as it was and I uh told it with
a lot of emotion because I thought I was
talking to my friends I didn't I wasn't
writing a piece for the Wall Street
Journal um and U I sent it off and I
think about a few days later um my inbox
had something like
176 emails from PE random people from
around the world that I didn't know
asking me if I had written this email
and so I was like what's what's going on
how did this you know get to different
people and then it was posted on blogs
and on websites and printed across the
world and um different newspapers and
became this um strange sensation um and
people kind of saying you know we didn't
know it was this bad in Iraq we didn't
know uh that it was this dangerous um
and what had happened was apparently
most of my friends had forwarded the
email around and their friends had
forwarded and it just you know uh went
all over the place I think the response
that I got from people the outpouring of
uh of emotion and the outpouring of
emails and letters that I got made me
think that maybe there's a a personal
story to be told um about Iraq uh and
one that was more Reflections and
Impressions rather than just the
chronology of of what had happened
politically and militarily um you know
but I to be honest I also came under a
lot of pressure after that email you
know there were um the sort of far-left
saying oh the media censors the news um
and you know he was praising me for
writing what I had thought but also
saying oh how come you don't say this in
your published pieces and the far right
saying you're biased and you know you
don't you're not fit to cover Iraq which
I think both accusations were untrue um
we had been saying that stuff just in a
journalistic objective way um and my
published pieces were not um biased at
all so um yeah so that that was that in
itself was an interesting experience
[Music]
